title: Table 167 - Row 19
clause_text: Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.: (d) If podiums are proposed, does it allow the movement of fire fighting vehicle properly ? | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No. | : Yes / No.
